meanings.definition: damaging the good reputation of someone; slanderous
meanings.sent1: The defamatory remarks made by the bully hurt my friend's feelings.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper published a defamatory article about the politician.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's defamatory comments about the cat were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The defamatory words were like poison, spreading negativity everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The defamatory graffiti on the wall was a stark reminder of the power of words.
